scripts.reset: npm run _install && npm run bootstrap && npm run _unlink
scripts.release:patch: npm run verify-git-not-dirty && npm run build && lerna version patch --no-private --yes && lerna run --no-private build:unpkg:dist && lerna publish --no-private from-package --yes
scripts.release:prerelease:dev: npm run verify-git-not-dirty && npm run build && lerna version prerelease --no-private --yes && lerna run --no-private build:unpkg:dist && lerna publish --no-private from-package --dist-tag dev --yes
